title: Troll
description: Intelligent, wicked, 8’ tall humanoids with emaciated, rubbery bodies. Consume the flesh of other humanoids. Dwell underground, in barren wilderness, and in the ruined homes of former victims.
extras: Regeneration: 3 rounds after being damaged, start regaining 3hp per round. Severed limbs reattach.	Return from death: If killed (0hp), will regenerate and fight again in 2d6 rounds.	Fire and acid: Cannot regenerate damage from these sources. The only way to permanently kill a troll.	Fear of fire: Morale 8 when attacked with fire or acid.
